# BRANDING GUIDE README #
§1 This guide is made for the purpose of using the correct logo, colors and visual identity of Verge Currency.
§2 This Guide is Official and all requirements should be respected.
§3 Anyone can contribute to the graphics of Verge, either for the own project or to support the expansion of Verge Currency.
§4 Any suggestions to the Branding rules for Verge are welcome.
§5 Do not use old logos or colors of verge if the intetion is to promote Verge.


CREDITS:
Logo redesign, color scheme and branding guide has been made by waveon3, @waveon3.
Credit for Wraith Logodesign: Dennis



WORK MADE FOR VERGE CURRENCY BELONGS TO VERGE CURRENCY.

Last edited, 23. april 2018.
